bib.title: Application of local bidirectional language model to error correction in Polish medical speech recognition
bib.author: Sas, J
bib.abstract: In the paper, the method of short word deletion errors correction in automatic speech recognition is described. Short word deletion errors appear to be a frequent error type in Polish speech recognition. The proposed speech recognition process consists of two stages. At the first stage the utterance is recognized by a typical speech recognizer based on forward bigram language model.
